Layer list

Back to index

The layer list lists the image layers in the editor. Each layer is displayed with its name and a thumbnail representing the content of the editor. Layers can be selected by clicking on them in the layer list.

To left of the thumbnail is the visibility toggle, allowing the layer to either be shown or hidden. The button is a filled circle when a layer is visible, and a hollow circle when the layer is hidden.

To the right of the layer name, appearing when the layer is hovered over in the layer list, are arrows for re-ordering the layer list. Layers are ordered in descending order of their visual priority. A preceeding layer in the layer list will render over layers below it in the canvas.
